summary: This document is a correspondence from the U.S. Department of Justice to Jack A. Goldberger, Esq., regarding subpoenas issued to JEGE, Inc. and Hyperion Air, Inc. It discusses the extension of deadlines for compliance with the subpoenas and mentions the representation of these entities by Goldberger. The document also references communications with other attorneys involved in the case. This document contains various records related to the aircraft registration and ownership of a Boeing 727-31, including security agreements and conveyances involving Real Estate Exchange, Inc. and Limited Service Corporation. It outlines the obligations and rights of the parties involved in the ownership and financing of the aircraft.
